name: The Room 01
description:
Escape this room.

"The Room 01" is a short little game, where depending on your luck you may or may not open the door.

FEATURES
* Play time from few seconds up to few minutes of pure struggle. 
* The key does not fit in.
* Absolutely no music (we know, you like it!)
* Finally something in english, oh wait-

Made in 4 hours in August of 2022.
